structure.unit: Sec. 11-2002. - DEFINITIONS SUPPLEMENTAL TO GENERAL STATUTES.

law.text: Words and phrases used in this chapter and not specifically defined in ยง11-2001 above shall have the meaning respectively ascribed to them by Chapter 20 of the General Statutes of North Carolina. (Code 1950, ยง29.1) State law reference: Definitions in state motor vehicle act, G.S. 20-4-01.
